column5: Hi, I have a Jiffy 30, with the word FirePower on the blade. Long story short, I ripped off the blade and bent the hell out of the bottom. I want to fix it myself but I don't remember exactly how it looked. If anyone could send me some pics of the bottom of this auger, I would really appreciate it. It is an older model as well....maybe 10 years???  Thanks,  Mark  [emailÂ protected]
Forget it and buy a new auger. The angles are critical!
